nodes.text: This personal journal was kept by Sabine Wren of the Spectres during her time with the group. In this journal, she recorded various information, including details about the members of the group, enemies that they had encountered, such as the Grand Inquisitor, and her personal sketches and artwork.
The real-life reference book Sabine My Rebel Sketchbook, released by Studio Fun International, is intended to be a replica of this journal.
